#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define ll long long


int main()
{
	
	ll n,i,j,k;
	ll t,m=-1;
		scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		ll ar[n+1];
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		scanf("%lld",&ar[i]);
		ll ans=-1;
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			ll s=0;
			for(j=i;j<=n;j+=i)
			s=s+ar[j];
		//	cout<<s<<endl;
			ans=max(ans,s);
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
	return 0;
	}
